title: Email confidentiality during account recovery.
body: A friend of mine got his account hacked and stolen, he is now using the account recovery system. I want to ask if Riot emails the current user of the account about the recovery process at any time because that might give him time to react or is it confidential between the person recovering and Riot?

replies.body:
It's confidential, so if someone unauthorized has control of the account, they don't have a way of knowing we're assisting the account owner with recovery.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
